channel.title: Sometimes, you need to sit back...
channel.description: Sometimes, you need to sit back...kick your feet up, arms behind your head, and just say, "Yup. I did that...."

item.title: Sometimes, you need to sit back...
item.dc:creator: darkone
item.description:
Best feeling ever when you are able to do that.

Ok I am going to use this as a chance to advertise a game. https://store.steampowered.com/app/270150/RUNNING_WITH_RIFLES/ mostly because while I am not a “dev” or paid I have helped with about 1/5 of the weapons in the base game. (I like voxel modeling, and .xml is way easier to understand then people say it is)

Read full topic
item.source: Sometimes, you need to sit back...
